mapper.insert: insert into members(id, pass, nickname, email, region, birth, favorite, profile_img, question, answer) values(#{id}, #{pass}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{region}, #{birth}, #{favorite}, #{profileImg}, #{question}, #{answer} )
mapper.update: update members set pass=#{pass}, nickname=#{nickname}, email=#{email}, region=#{region}, birth=#{birth}, favorite=#{favorite}, profile_img=#{profileImg}, question=#{question}, answer=#{answer} where id=#{id}
